name: mzfviewer-1
description: Z80-based computer file viewer. Originally Sharp MZ80K, but also Sinclair ZX80/ZX81

scripts.clean: rm -rf public/pkg public/*.html public/*.js public/sinclair public/sharp
scripts.copy:assets: cp s*.html public/ && cp *.js public/ && cp -r sinclair/ public/sinclair && cp -r sharp/ public/sharp
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:wasm && npm run copy:assets && npm run build:css && npm run serve:firebase
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:wasm && npm run copy:assets
